Sentencas: In this study, the structure-property correlation in the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing system is systematically investigated.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: In particular, the effect of ZrO2 on the structure and chemical compatibility of the glasses is clearly demonstrated.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: The increases in the glass transition temperature and softening temperature of the glasses indicate that the glass structure is condensed by the ZrO2 dopant, which is further confirmed by the B-11 and Si-29 NMR spectra.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the addition of ZrO2 reduces the crystallization tendency of the glasses.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: The fraction of Cr6+ in the glass/Cr2O3 reaction couple decreases significantly with increasing ZrO2 content at 700 degrees C because of the condensed glass structure, whereas the fraction of Cr6+ increases with increasing ZrO2 content at 750 and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: This behavior is related to the increase in residual glass content in the glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: Good bondage can be observed at the interfaces between glasses and Crofer 22APU after being held at 800 degrees C for 500 hours.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation

Sentencas: These results demonstrate the suitability of the Zr-containing glass-ceramics as sealing materials for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Development of the CaO-SrO-ZrO2-B2O3-SiO2 sealing glasses for solid oxide fuel cell applications: structure-property correlation
